channel.title: Source
channel.description: is it possible to run the source if u start the comp, so it will start automatic. ive to keep open the source, if i wont the players cant login anymore. its very annoying. and vps isnt an option for me.. sorry for my bad english, im on my mobile right now.

item.title: Source
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

The key to running a successful Runescape private server is to do so on the family computer (parents love to see command prompts spewing exceptions - which are a result of pasting code from forum tutorials that morons write). That way you can cheap out on the costs of VPS until you get stupid 12 year olds to donate to your generic hacked up Project Insanity base.

Read full topic

item.title: Source
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Add it to your startup folder.
Click ‘Start’, click ‘All Programs’ or ‘All Accessories’ and then look for the startup folder. Right click it and press ‘Explore’ or ‘Open’, but do not press ‘Expand’. Now copy your run.bat file and put it in there and it should start when your computer starts up. You also might want to disable a password for your account so you don’t have to log in, just turn on the computer and your server will be on as soon as windows is done loading.

Read full topic
